game_description: Experience MOON - a gripping musical journey through the unknowable cosmos. Built from the ground up, this VR experience will take you through eerie celestial environments guided by spatial audio and a surround sound adventure you wonâ€™t forget. -Fully rendered real-time environments -Spatialized environment audio combined with ambisonic surround music -7 minutes of a gritty and psychedelic sci-fi journey -Sinister story of what happens when humanity attempts to know the unknowable Credits: Code/Art - Jeff Bull Jr Art - Trey Stimpson Audio - Dara Crawford Music Credits: Composition/Production - Dara Crawford Vocals - Zamm Kenoby Drums - Darren Doherty Guitars - Jeff Bull Jr Special Thanks Hand Rigging - Jeremy Wynn
